citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
On June 12, 2023, inspectors observed investigators completing a procedure on a pig. When the investigators completed
the procedure, the Veterinary Technician administered a bolus of potassium chloride via intracardiac injection. After
review of protocol P-003, the drug use section indicated potassium chloride should be administered by intravenous
injection.
Proposed activities and propose significant changes in ongoing activities that have been approved by the IACUC may be
subject to further appropriate review and approval by officials of the research facility. However, those officials may not
approve an activity involving the care and use of animals if it has not been approved by the IACUC.
To be corrected by: July 13, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
GLORIA MCFADDEN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
